titles.title: The Rain Of God Is Falling

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The rain of God is falling
Is falling o'er land
Elijah's cloud's appearing
Like a man's five fingered hand
The plantings of the Lord arise
With fruit on every tree
The Sons of God are going forth
And we shall be set free

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The breath of God is blowing
Is blowing over the land
The dead dry bones are stirring
At the Word of our command
We're blowing forth the breath of life
The body's growing strong
Rise up, Rise up, ye Sons of God,
And sing the vict'ry song.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And those who hear the trumpet call
From down in Babylon will go to
Jerusalem despite the evil one,
So yield up your members one and all
To His almighty hand go up, go up, ye
